items.badge_description: You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 220 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 45.

items.checkin_comment: Best of the flight! Crisp hazy with forward citrus and good mouthfeel.

beer.beer_description: Brewed with hops selected from as far away as Australia and New Zealand. Smooth, big, juicy, and full of flavor.

items.badge_description: At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 290 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 59! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.checkin_comment:
This is a nice, super easy drinking Hazy. I like that I’m not picking up a lot of hop burn or bitterness in the finish and there is some decent stone fruit n tropical hop notes. Doesn’t stand out but super drinkable and enjoyable. 
Thanks Travis G. !!!

beer.beer_description: Brewed with hops selected from as far away as Australia and New Zealand. Smooth, big, juicy, and full of flavor.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 485 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 98!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 480 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 97! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 275 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 56! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 105 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 22!

beer.beer_description: Brewed with hops selected from as far away as Australia and New Zealand. Smooth, big, juicy, and full of flavor.

items.badge_description:
Start the season off right with your friends from Punch Cigars! Get to know the Official Cigar of Beer Lovers a little better here: www.punchcigars.com.
For sale in the U.S. only.
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 5 distinct venues!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 5 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 2!

user.bio: Voracious reader, avid cyclist, history aficionado, craft beer enthusiast,  soon-to-be-retired software engineer.
Visually impaired beer lover, travels for beer, love meeting people from here IRL. I follow you for your descriptions.
